pkg
#debug(rtd:::to_rst)

#build_site(pkg = "~/Dropbox/public/github_flow/", topics)
topics = topics = c(
	"setup", 
	"to_flowmat",
	"to_flowdef",
	"to_flow",
	"plot_flow",
	"submit_flow",
	"kill_flow", 
	"rerun_flow",
	"queue", 
	"job",
	"flow"
	)

tmp <- build_topics(pkg = pkg, topics = topics)
